website_summaries.verdict: Moms love the styling and patterns, but the shoulder padding built into this sling gets mixed reviews.
pros: Fast and simple to put on
Shoulder padding and extra pocket for keys are huge pluses
Fits most infants and babies well
cons: Takes a few weeks of use to fully break in
Fabric is thick and can be hot in the summer
Padding can bunch up on the shoulder and neck

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like this carrier but I got it for traveling through the airport with my son who doesn't love being in the stroller. My hope was to carry him though security without a big fuss but since the ring is metal I ended up having to take my son out and put it through the x-ray machine. Maybe I missed the trick on easily putting this on with your child but we always struggle to get in it comfortably for the first few minutes. Once it's on the padded shoulder is great! There is a little too much material though, the loose end seems to flap around and hit things when I walk around.
customer_reviews.author: S Dway

customer_reviews.title: Great sling
customer_reviews.text: You have to be a sling person to enjoy the Maya. Its super comfortable for both mama & baby, but you need to know how to wear it propoerly or you’ll hate it. I love this sling, so does my husband. I’m 5’5” & he’s 6’9”, we bought a large and I just deal with a long tail which is a great double as a nursing cover. For him its just long enough of a tail to be safe. I do reccommend a ring sling to mamas who know they want to commit to baby wearing in this style.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I used this when my kids were babies and even still at the airport for my 2 year old. It's perfect for 99% of the time because it's effortless to put on; others can be so cumbersome, I would never use them. If hiking, you would probably want something that goes on both shoulders, but other than that, this is great. I have had Bjorn, ergo, moby, k'tan and maya. K'tan and Maya were my absolute favorites.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Several different carries are comfortable for both me (bad back and all) and for my child. I will be able to use a greater variety of carries as she grows bigger. I am 5'3 and I ordered the longer size. In retrospect, I probably would've been fine with the regular length. When my kid is in a side-sitting carry (at 6 months) I bring the tail around to the side opposite the rings and tuck it till secure, using it as a cover for her legs and feet. We're generally barefoot inside and it keeps her feet and legs from feeling cold.
customer_reviews.author: DoUKnowAlex

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as before
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my original Maya wrap in 2011, which I loved. This one feels (purchased in 2016) completely different and I don't feel like I have it secure enough to remove my hand from holding the bottom of my baby. Money waisted... I ended up getting a different carrier because I don't trust this one.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Padded shoulder not as comfy for large shoulders!
customer_reviews.text: A good starter ring sling for people... I wouldn't recommend the padded shoulder if you're larger up top as it doesn't have the width to spread out, which is much more comfortable if you have larger shoulders. Note that it will be stiff when you first get it, but keep using it, sit on it and wash/dry it a few times to break it in. Once it's broken in, it really feels great and is supportive. Easy to clean, which is good!
customer_reviews.author: S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great for babywearing
customer_reviews.text: We use this pretty much every day. Our son loves to be worn and it's a great solution to give mommy and daddy back their arms and prevent us from straining them after hours and hours of bouncing our infant. He goes right to sleep in it usually and it's very comfortable to wear him in so far (he just hit 12 pounds). I have some problems with it bunching towards my neck on my narrow shoulders, however, this is my husband's favorite sling. I also like having the pocket to store things in.
customer_reviews.author: NYCNomNom

customer_reviews.title: Good for taller women
customer_reviews.text: Cute colors and was comfortable overall. Returned though because I found that the structured shoulder prevented me from getting it as snug as I wanted (I’m short, 5’1” with a shorter torso so if you’re taller may be fine for you).
customer_reviews.author: LEDNY

customer_reviews.title: Saves grandmothers back and arm from strain!
customer_reviews.text: Real back saver! Can't hold my granddaughter for as long as she wants. So thought I'd try the Maya wrap. Works great. Love the padded shoulder by the rings. Allows me to carry her comfortably without back and arm strain. Can carry her and still do small amounts of kitchen work, food prep and other work at same time. Bought large as granddaughter was eight months at the time. Daughter tried and likes better than front pack style she had (less cumbersome to get into). Now we share it. She brings when be babysit.
customer_reviews.author: madcook!

customer_reviews.title: beautiful fabric, my baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: beautiful fabric, my baby loves it. As with all carriers its a very personal decision as to what you like best for each different task. I have an ergo carrier as well as a wrap and i like all of them for different reasons. I love how quick a ring sling is for simple outings and times when there will be lots of 'on/off' activity. my baby loves it and i like how breathable it is.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: great for my big baby/toddler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Maya wrap for my 10 month old and it's been so helpful on vacation. He's 25 pounds so he's getting tough to carry around. I used structured carriers (ergo and Kelty) but the straps and buckles made them slow to get on/off. It's so easy to get him in and out of the Maya which is perfect for all the different activities on our trip. He's still heavy and my shoulder would get tired, but it's tons better than carrying him!
customer_reviews.author: Fun and Learning

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite baby carrier! I love how easy it is to get my baby in and out whenever and wherever I need to. The carrier itself is beautiful and I love the color scheme. My almost one year old son has been very happy in this carrier. I love that I can wear it without him in it (and it actually looks good!) while he's riding in a cart and easily slip him in when he needs to be close to mom. I would definitely recommend this carrier.
customer_reviews.author: karly704

customer_reviews.title: Really worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was debating on a Maya Wrap or a cheaper ring sling. After reading both reviews I chose to go with the Maya Wrap, and I am so glad that I did! I feel completely comfortable with my 14lb 1 month old in it. The biggest reason I purchased this wrap was to be able to breastfeed in public, and it definitely does that job. The material is slightly heavy, so it gets really warm when I wear him outside in South Louisiana. However, it's not too bad, and my little man likes to be really warm. Overall, I am beyond happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: I was fine paying extra for 100% cotton
customer_reviews.text: I just got this on the mail, so my review is about the product components and not performance. I was fine paying extra for 100% cotton, but to my surprise the tag says that the lining is 100% polyester. The whole point with 100% cotton was avoiding plastic...
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful weave. The pocket is great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful weave. The pocket is great. Lost a star because I wish the large was actually about a foot longer or that they offered one that was a little longer. I am a plus-sized mom and I wanted to be able to use it to nurse more modestly and it's just a too short for me to do this but without the additional length there is no way I could have used the pocket and it is an overall beautiful wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Love the ring sling it's comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the ring sling it's comfortable and easy to use. Love the colors and concept of this product. Only complaint is that the fabric is not as breathable as I was hoping so it can be a little hot. I'd still give this 5 stars because it is a great product holds my baby comfortably and allows me to be hands free while holding my baby close without a ton of fabric(moby wrap) or straps(backpacks) and I get tons of compliments when I'm wearing it too which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Nikkel

customer_reviews.title: Amazon happily returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned! I’m too stupid to figure out how this dang works. My baby hated it, the fabric looked like it was digging into her skin.
customer_reviews.author: CarliCasti

customer_reviews.title: Favorite way to wear baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ring sling. The pocket is a plus! I get compliments on the color every time I wear it. I am 5'6" and ordered the large length but could have easily gotten by with the medium length (even when using it to breast feed). I will be buying these as gifts and will probably own multiple ones soon as the colors are all so pretty. The padded area is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: James W O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I definately wanted to have a carrier for my first child, both for me and for my husband. We ended up getting the moby originally, however honestly it just takes too long to get on. When I already had it on it wasn't too bad, and I was much better at it than my husband, but it was difficult. This sling is awesome! There was a bit of a learning curve with how to adjust it just right so it didn't hurt our shoulders but both my husband and I use it all the time now! Baby loves it, he calms right down when we put him in it so he pretty much spends all day in the thing now.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie D, San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Greatest sling ever
customer_reviews.text: I adore this sling! Padded so that it’s comfy. Nice ring that does not slip. The added pocket makes this the greatest sling ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jones

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS SLING
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS SLING! My first reason is that it is made with quality fabric and design. I am 5 foot 9 inches and weigh 200 lbs and the medium fit perfectly. Wearing a sling does have a learning curve and I find the three colors help me pull the fabric in the right place. I love the colors also because my son in law isn't embarrassed to wear it. I would definitely buy this again!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Fabric too heavy for adjusting fit
customer_reviews.text: Material is too thick to make this sling easily adjustable. It is impossible to make adjustments for proper fit, in the manner described in the video and manual, because of the weight of the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Guenther

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product for my daughter in law and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sling- easy to use, wash, bring along, and it's comfortable. I also have a Moby and Ergo, but this is the fastest, easiest carrier to use for around the house now that our baby is bigger than 13 pounds- which means she's too big to really work in the Moby, and not big enough to fit well in the Ergo (on my back- front is ok). I like the padding, I have friends who don't.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: This Rocks! Here's why...
customer_reviews.text: We've had one last through 3 children and then it got kinda ratty so we bought a new one for the 4th. We get compliments wherever we go but the real deal is that it's simply the most convenient and best for the child of all the wraps we've used or tried over the years. It rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Michael Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Thick fabric. I haven't used it much since my ...
customer_reviews.text: Thick fabric. I haven't used it much since my little one is not a fan. I'm not sure if he gets mad with the process of getting in it or just being in it. Tightening can be awkward while adjusting it on their legs and your shirt as it gets bunched up.
customer_reviews.author: TheB-Ys

customer_reviews.title: I tried both the padded and not padded maya wrap ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried both the padded and not padded maya wrap. I prefer the not padded one because you can form it around ur shoulder. This padded one slides into your neck
customer_reviews.author: rosa

customer_reviews.title: ... this for the last 16 months and I still love it and use it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for the last 16 months and I still love it and use it! In the kitchen at the store around the neighborhood...so useful, pretty and practical. I love keeping my baby close and having my hands free. I barely use my stroller because My baby and I love this wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love my Maya wrap!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wrap! The pocket is awesome for small little necessities. The quality is fabulous. This wrap does not disappoint. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Eads

customer_reviews.title: my favorite carrier
customer_reviews.text: Love this sling. I've tried several different carriers, and I've settled on a few that I use regularly. But this is the one I like and use the most. I wear this one around the house for light chores or while working on the computer, for short walks, for social gatherings, shopping, and other outings. I use the Ergo for long walks, doing light yard work, and for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend and she adores it! Sturdy and beautiful. Totally hippie just like her. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Katy V

customer_reviews.title: This is working like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Well, I bought this for my 22 lb standard dachshund. She had leg surgery and can only walk a little for 6 weeks. She loves to walk with our other standard dachshund. This is working like a charm. I can still walk him and carry her. She loves it! She will sit quietly and yet can see everything that goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Gailbe

customer_reviews.title: Could not live without it. Makes life with 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Could not live without it. Makes life with 2 much easier, and the trips to the store with a newborn where people usually try to touch your new baby. They dont when youve got them wrapped up in this. Cant wait to try to breastfeed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca g

customer_reviews.title: I loved this wrap for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I loved this wrap for traveling. Used it on the airplane so I could hold my 2 month comfortably close without all the straps like other carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Venus Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Started using with my 10 month old & I'm very pregnant and it definitely helped to redistribute the weight so my back didn't hurt as bad. I'm looking forward to using it with my new arrival in July.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I love my wrap
customer_reviews.text: I love my wrap! It took me a little bit to get used to nursing my son in it, but once we got into a rhythm, it's a piece of cake! Would definitely recommend to any mom, nursing or not. I especially love the extra material, so I can use the excess as a cover while nursing
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Wrap
customer_reviews.text: Have bought ither wraps, but this is the best so far. I love the zipper pocket to jold keys, wallet, toys, and etc... Very comfortable. Wish I didnt waste money buying other ones, and just bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Esthercise

customer_reviews.title: Love this sling!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, great material, washes well! Also really love the comfort padding in the shoulder. Would recommend to anyone, much easier to use than the complicated wraps, especially for someone short (I am 5'1).
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeAddict

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fabric but too thick and rough to adjust easily
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colored fabric but it didn't work well for this ring sling. The fabric is rough and thick making it very hard to adjust. I wanted to keep it because it was so pretty, but after several attempts to make it work, i returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Celery

customer_reviews.title: Not as great with heavier babies.
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it seems harder with heavier babies... I feel like I have to keep adjusting it a lot, it keeps pulling down eventually from the weight of my baby and she's only 16.2lbs..
customer_reviews.author: Tgan529

customer_reviews.title: Great for shopping too
customer_reviews.text: Take the time to practice and it's so worth it. My son who wouldn't be put down lived in this thing for months! I could still cook and do other things hands free and it never hurt my back. Great for shopping too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay but prefer ergo baby
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but it causes me a lot of discomfort across my back when I wear it for anything other than around the house. Maybe I am not wearing it correctly. I much prefer my ergo baby or Bjorne if I am going to wear it for walks or any length of time.
customer_reviews.author: jbr

customer_reviews.title: It gets a little warm with the Florida summer but all in all we love it
customer_reviews.text: Comfy! Exactly what we ordered! We use this everyday. It gets a little warm with the Florida summer but all in all we love it
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great wrap. I couldn't get used to the Moby ...
customer_reviews.text: Great wrap. I couldn't get used to the Moby since my baby always ended up at my navel level. Wrap keeps her high and comfy - within kissing reach. It's winter - so I mainly use this at the house for a few hours. If I'm running into a store, it's a hassle to get her in a snow suit, out of a snow suit, into wrap then have to carry snowsuit around.... But will definitely use in the Spring/Summer/Fall around town.
customer_reviews.author: A. N. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the ring sling!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my maya wrap! I have looked for several different baby carriers. I tried the moby wrap and snuggie carrier. Both too complicated it wasn't the comfort I was looking for. The ring sling is so easy to use for my 3 month old. I love the closeness and I feel completely safe with him in it. My baby looks so much more comfortable than the other baby carriers. Ring sling really is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Slone

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Loved babywearing my little one in it. He’s outgrown it now, but it has been passed on to my sister for her you fest daughter. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wrap with grand ideas of baby wearing like a cool/hip new mom and to be a light weight option so I didn't have to take my ergo baby everywhere. Maybe it was my FTM nerves or my lack of coordination but I could not figure the damn thing out. I watched the DVD and attempted to follow the instructions but I could never get it so I felt safe carrying my tiny new born son around in it. I am sure there are lots of moms who were able to make it work, but I found that it just didn't work out for me. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I love wearing my baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit trying at first but after a few you tube videos and practice runs I am able to wear my baby with confidence. I have even mastered the position for nursing.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sturdy sling!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sling!! Beautiful material, sturdy and comfortable. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Too hot for the summertime though. I used this for half the year and I used a handmade thinner one I bought on Amazon for the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: KristenTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: this sling has been wonderful and i appreciate the cost for what you get
customer_reviews.text: this sling has been wonderful and i appreciate the cost for what you get. the only recommendation i have to help it be that much better is the location of the pocket. its nice to have the pocket for keys and/or phone but it's in an awkward place that slaps against your hip or thigh when walking. the
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have had this with my first child
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sling! I have had 4 different carriers so far and this one is the best. I can easily get my 1.5 year old in and out. Carrying her is easy on my back and she loves it. I also love the pocket to carry things in.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: It's a great material & the shoulder pad was nice
customer_reviews.text: The wrap was very uncomfortable for me and my son. It's a great material & the shoulder pad was nice, but I was just not a fan of how it put the extra weight on my shoulder. Also, if you are a warm natured person I would not recommend this. The material is thick and gets baby warm quick and the next thing you know, you are going to be very hot and sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Dahme

customer_reviews.title: I like this one a lot although it does take some ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third baby carrier to date. I like this one a lot although it does take some time to figure out. Definitely look up instruction videos online or check out the dvd.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha P

customer_reviews.title: Love this sling!
customer_reviews.text: This ring sling is a lifesaver! Very comfortable and the color and fabric are very nice. Only complaint is it catches a lot of lint.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I used it all the time when my baby was NB-4 months. It started to put some strain on my neck; the side it was on. But, I did love it, and think if I had someone to physically work with me on wearing it, and adjusting it, it would have worked out better.
customer_reviews.author: A. PHILLIPS

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was recommended by experienced baby wearers. Very comfortable and baby really enjoys it (6 month old). I use it when I'm doing chores around the house, when I'm grocery shopping and when we go for walks. My stroller is now collecting dust. :) glad that product included instructional DVD because it helped me fold the wrap in a way which makes adjusting easy for putting baby in and taking baby out.
customer_reviews.author: RoosMomma

customer_reviews.title: Best Ring Sling
customer_reviews.text: Love this wrap. It's so easy to use! And versatile. I got a size larger than the recommendation so I could use it to nurse. LOVE the pocket and the light padding at the top. Even better, my kid loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jboxer27

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be hard to use. And it the material is almost burlap like. A little too warm for my little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Mardrid

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to use/wear compared to others
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use/wear compared to others, Although, I think the price it’s high for what it’s worth. I used it a couple of times since my baby gets really hot when I carry him with the wrap, but hopefully I can get to use it more now that is colder.
customer_reviews.author: Lalazenlove

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Pain
customer_reviews.text: I sent this product back. It really caused a lot of pain to my shoulder. I myself prefer a wrap where the weight is distributed more easily. Loved the color and the fabric was not as soft as I expected. Easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compliments. Baby likes it and so does mom and dad.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Great! Had another sling with no padding and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! Had another sling with no padding and this is WAY more comfortable. I wish I had gotten it early on with my baby. When she was around 3 months she was too big to sleep in it anymore, now waiting for better head control so I can use it to wear her on my hip.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Ideal ring sling.
customer_reviews.text: Great start to my baby wearing lifestyle. I get compliments on this ring sling every time I wear it. The built in pocket makes things even more portable! Thankful its made in Guatamela and not China!
customer_reviews.author: J Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Best by far!
customer_reviews.text: I knew I wanted a sling but wasnt sure how Id like it. Well, I have to say my Maya wrap is probably the best thing I could have purchased for myself and my baby. He loves it and sleeps very well in it when we are out and about. HIGHLY recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nolamom

customer_reviews.title: its a great, sturdy sling
customer_reviews.text: Still using this with my 15 month, 32lb toddler... its a great, sturdy sling.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wrap ever! I would not be able to get anything done w/o this. Baby loves it, and mommy loves it! Keeps him snuggled to me and he will sleep for nil his next feed. The material is thick and washable. Also, I love that it can be used in various positions so it grows with baby!
customer_reviews.author: Meli

customer_reviews.title: Returning. Fabric does not glide smoothly as mentioned. ...
customer_reviews.text: Returning. Fabric does not glide smoothly as mentioned. It gathers up and makes impossible to slide through sling.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for an infant
customer_reviews.text: Great for an infant. Was not comfortable after about 4 months old though and hard to adjust. I couldn't do it without my husband's help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ring sling. The material is great bc it gives a little and I love the wide padded shoulder area. I’m on the petite side and it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfortable, with padded shoulder support
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable, with padded shoulder support. I used this with my daughter as an infant (front carry), but I prefer it now that she is 8 months old and can sit on my hip. She is like a little spider monkey clinging onto me when she is in this, and I can go a few hours before it does feel uncomfortable. I use this for quick trips to store, while shopping or at restaurants, and for shorter walks. I also like the zippered pocket in the tail. Took me several tries to get the hang of how to fit it properly, but now it's a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love this wrap
customer_reviews.text: This ring sling is comfortable and soft right out of the box. I have always loved Maya Wraps, the quality and colors are amazing. The patter on this is stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Both mommy and baby loved this Sling. Great quality. Loved the color. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love. It's easy to use and my baby enjoys to hang out in it. Helps me with getting things done around the house or when she's tired of being in the stroller when we're out and about.
customer_reviews.author: beeplogic

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful ring sling
customer_reviews.text: Great fabric and comes in great colors! DVD helps you figure out how to do the various carrying techniques. The slightly padded shoulder is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Sew Austin

customer_reviews.title: Not secure enough for newborn
customer_reviews.text: Don't get this thing. Did not seem secure at all. Baby can slip right out of it. And I watched all the instructional videos, still don't understand how this thing secures a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love for my toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Great for baby and my toddler. Especially the toddler, as when they get bigger, it's easier to hip carry them. This is also a lot more breathable than my other carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have a 1 yr old and a 6 week old, and the wrap allows me to be mobile with my new born! And I love the vibrant colors also!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Love my maya wrap
customer_reviews.text: Love my maya wrap and my baby does too. It's very sturdy and feels very secure. The handy pocket is awesome for my keys and or phone on. A quick walk. Only drawback for me is that the fabrics picks up on a lot of lint.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, nice fabric, and I love the pocket, I can carry my phone and wallet. The extra fabric makes it easy to breastfeed in public.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Rough material
customer_reviews.text: It's a little more challenging to use than I anticipated, but I have used it a handful of times with my newborn. The material is very rough considering you are using it with an infant. I prefer my k'tan thus far with my 7 week old. The material is a soft cotton and generally easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Angeline B.

customer_reviews.title: function and fashion
customer_reviews.text: The wrap works very well. Very sturdy fabric without being the least bit abrasive. Very comfortable to wear and holds baby securely. My son is three months old and I'm certain that this will be the only wrap I need. I am a large woman - 5' 6" and weigh 200 lbs. so I bought the large wrap and the size is perfect. I think the medium would have been too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this! My baby girl loves it too
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My baby girl loves it too. Comfortable alternative to the carriers that put all the weight into your shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger J. Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Love this wrap
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to use, easy to clean and has a fool proof DVD to help get you started.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail C Wright

customer_reviews.title: An essential baby item.
customer_reviews.text: Very classy looking and comfortable. I think the small might have been more convenient being on the short side... So I end up wrapping the excess cloth around the loop.
customer_reviews.author: marmalade

customer_reviews.title: great sling
customer_reviews.text: Though pricey, this carrier is great. My 20 lb 5 month old loved it until he figured out he wanted to see more and face out. Unfortunately he doesn't like his legs bunched up and his weight was killing my shoulder but this was a great carrier while it lasted. I was too scared to try it when he was really little but will use it lots with the next one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D

customer_reviews.title: Love this sling
customer_reviews.text: Love this sling! Very easy to use, and comfortable. Like the pocket it's very deep, and comes in handy to store my keys and phone when I don't want to carry a purse.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Takes some time to get used to and ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Takes some time to get used to and comfortable with using it, but my baby loves it and its comfortable to wear and durable
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: High quality material and beautiful color, but the learning curve for ring slings ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality material and beautiful color, but the learning curve for ring slings is too steep for me. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Badge Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Not great for a newborn
customer_reviews.text: Might be great but didn't work for my baby. Canvas is too hot and cut off circulation in her legs. Might be great for an older baby but not for a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Baby must have!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. So convenient for quick outings since my son refuses to sit in his car seat. I can run my errands just like I used to with no problems. My baby usually falls right asleep when I place him in this sling. I was initially skeptical due to the price, but I'm so glad I bought this! We use our ergo for longer trips, but this is the perfect addition to our baby gear.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great ring sling.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors. Very comfortable. Needed to be washed to soften it up and not be so itchy but once I did that, it is super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Etoille

customer_reviews.title: I gave this as a gift to my daughter-in-law who ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my daughter-in-law who admired another mother wearing it in public to breast feed her baby in a very discreet manner. The only tricky part is learning how to wear it properly by watching the video first. There is a risk that the baby might slide out if not worn properly.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M.

customer_reviews.title: a gift that worked
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me so I sent it as a gift. Good feedback. Can't say from personal experience but from what I hear it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mireille

customer_reviews.title: ... haven't taken the time to practice using this product like I probably should
customer_reviews.text: I just haven't taken the time to practice using this product like I probably should. I got it to nurse hands free, but it doesn't seem to do well with large breasted women.
customer_reviews.author: MommaKrandis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to and I have tried everything out there: ergo, babybjorn, moby. Easy to use, easy to wash, easy to breastfeed while on the move.
customer_reviews.author: K.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for lightweight infant
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a light infant but once they get older/heavier, I love my baby hawk!
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable wrap that is easy to use and versatile in baby wearing positions. It is also very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: easy on
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, nice bright colors. Beware the color mix has a lot of pink so it's not super gender neutral (unless the men in your life like pink)
customer_reviews.author: amf

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best baby purchase I made! My son does not like to sit for long periods of time in his chair/swing. The wrap enables me to complete household chores and tasks, while holding my newborn. He loves the wrap too! It is a go to for cranky afternoons or witching dinner hours. I would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Turner

product_meta.title: Maya Wrap Lightly Padded Ring Sling | Ergonomic Baby Carrier | Integrated Pocket | Lightweight, Breathable Cotton | Asher (Medium)
feature_bullets: Breathable. Breathable, soft, 100% natural cotton with a moisture-wicking polyester shoulder pad keeps you cool and comfortable.
Hip-healthy. Hip-healthy position for baby and back/shoulder support for the adult means comfortable, ergonomic carrying for the whole family.
Easy, fast, and fully adjusable. Easy-to-use, fully adjustable design makes life easier as a new or seasoned parent and can be shared between caregivers without time-consuming adjustments.
Compact. Fast on-and-off and a compact design that fits comfortably into your diaper bag or stroller pocket.
Versatile. Versatile carrier lets you face your baby either in or out, snuggled against your chest or nestled on your hip. Discretely and easily breastfeed or bottle feed your baby on-the-go.

specifications.Material free: Phthalate Free, Lead Free, Latex Free, BPA Free
specifications.Care instructions: Machine wash cold water. No bleach, Line dry to avoid shrinkage.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars370 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
